DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess bioequivalence Lendormin Tablets ( Delpharm Reims ) vs. Lendormin Tablets ( Synmosa Biopharma Co. Ltd. ) follow oral administration
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Bioequivalence Brotizolam Tablets 250 Mcg vs. Lendormin Tablets 250 Mcg Administered Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy volunteer , provision sign write informed consent enrolment study , ability communicate investigator , understand comply requirement study . 2 . Healthy adult male , age 20 40 year old . 3 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 25 , inclusive , ( BMI calculate weight kilogram [ kg ] /height meters2 [ m2 ] ) . 4 . Physically mentally healthy subject confirm interview , medical history , clinical examination , chest xray electrocardiogram . 5 . No significant deviation normal biochemistry examination . 6 . No significant deviation normal haematology examination . 7 . No significant deviation normal urinalysis examination . Exclusion criterion : 1 . History drug alcohol abuse within past one year . 2 . Medical history allergic asthma sensitivity analogous drug . 3 . Evidence chronic acute infectious diseases 4 week study . 4 . Evidence clinical significant renal , cardiovascular , hepatic , hematopoietic , neurological , pulmonary gastrointestinal pathology . 5 . Ongoing peptic ulcer constipation . 6 . Planned vaccination time course study . 7 . Taking clinical investigation drug 3 month study . 8 . Use medication , include herb medicine vitamins 4 week study . 9 . Donation great 250 ml blood past 3 month prior dose donation 250 ml blood past 2 month prior dose . 10 . A positive Hepatitis B surface antigen positive Hepatitis C antibody result . 11 . A positive test HIV ( Human immunodeficiency virus ) antibody .
